product_name: Lanolips101 Ointment Strawberry & Phone Lip Balm Holder
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeIt's your wakeup call for dry lips! Meet the Lanolips Phone Lip Balm Holder, a handy attachment your dry lips will thank you for.
details: DetailsBenefitsLip care on lock. Say goodbye to lip balm-less days and dry lip selfies, searching around your bag to find your favorite Lanolips lip balm. Say hello to hydrated, soft and smooth lips. All day. Every day.Suitable for all phone cases. The Phone Lip Balm Holder comes with a sticker magnet Magsafe attachment. Perfect for content girls and pop-socket lovers, it's compatible with all phone types and styles. Snaps on, slides off.The Phone Lip Balm Holder comes packaged together with our bestselling Lanolips' hero 101 Ointment Strawberry.Snap, hydrate, repeat. Once your lip balm runs out, you can replace it with any other same-size tube from Lanolips.This super rich, 100% natural lip balm penetrates & seals in moisture to give extreme hydration for extremely dry and chapped lips.101 Uses include: Apply to dry cuticles/cracked heels/dry nasal passages. Melt it into your own moisturizer to supercharge. Mix a tiny bit with your foundation for a natural, dewy look. Keep eyebrows in place. Apply to windburn/cold-chapped cheeks. Heal dry/brittle nails, paper cuts, insect bites.Alleviate dryness associated with psoriasis and eczema.FeaturesFemale-Owned Beauty BrandTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productDermatologically TestedVegetarianFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsFragrancesParabensPthalatesPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2635714How To UsePRO TIP FOR SNAP ON HYDRATION ANYTIME. ANYWHERE.{#isPasted}Phone Lip Balm Holder:Step 1 - Insert your Lanolips tube from the bottom into the Phone Lip Balm Holder first.Step 2 - Then snap on the Phone Lip Balm Holder to your phone case. If the magnet doesn't automatically stick, use the Silicone 3M Ring with 3M tape, by removing the sticker back and applying it to the phone case.Step 3 - To remove, slide the Phone Lip Balm Holder off, side ways (if using the Silicone 3M Ring, use a citrus based solvent for adhesive removal).101 Ointment Multi Balm Strawberry: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.HOW TO USE:1x Silicone Lip Balm Holder - For Phones Compatible With Magsafe:Compatible with iPhone 12 or later without a phone case, or Magsafe phone cases.If magnet does not automatically stick, go to Step 6 onwards.Before attaching the Lip Balm Holder to your phone, insert Lanolips tube from the bottom of the Silicone Lip Balm Holder. Place onto the phone. You're ready to go!To remove, simply slide the Silicone Lip Balm Holder off sideways.1x Silicone 3M Ring - For Phones Which Are ++Not++ Magsafe:The Silicone 3M Ring is not required for Magsafe phones/cases.Silicone 3M ring is a magnet that sticks on your phone case to connect your Silicone (MagSafe) Lip Balm Holder. It is compatible with any case for iPhone 11 & earlier models; Android/other phones; cases without magnetic ring.Using the Silicone 3M Ring with 3M tape, remove the 3M sticker back, and apply to the back of the phone case.Continue with Steps 3 and 4 above.To remove the Silicone 3M Ring, use a citrus based solvent for adhesive removal. It is not Class 3 Flammable, which ensures it is much safer than traditional hydrocarbon solvents and can be easily wiped off with a clean cloth.Do not use the Silicone (MagSafe) Lip Balm Holder to pick up your phone. Do not put your fingers through it to hold your phone. Only intended to hold lip balm. Do not stick the 3M onto your phone directly, only onto a phone case.IngredientsLanolin*, Flavour (Aroma)*, Carthamus Tinctorious (Safflower) Seed Oil*, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract*, Tocopherol (Vit E)*. *Naturally Derived
how_to_use: PRO TIP FOR SNAP ON HYDRATION ANYTIME. ANYWHERE.{#isPasted}Phone Lip Balm Holder:Step 1 - Insert your Lanolips tube from the bottom into the Phone Lip Balm Holder first.Step 2 - Then snap on the Phone Lip Balm Holder to your phone case. If the magnet doesn't automatically stick, use the Silicone 3M Ring with 3M tape, by removing the sticker back and applying it to the phone case.Step 3 - To remove, slide the Phone Lip Balm Holder off, side ways (if using the Silicone 3M Ring, use a citrus based solvent for adhesive removal).101 Ointment Multi Balm Strawberry: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.HOW TO USE:1x Silicone Lip Balm Holder - For Phones Compatible With Magsafe:Compatible with iPhone 12 or later without a phone case, or Magsafe phone cases.If magnet does not automatically stick, go to Step 6 onwards.Before attaching the Lip Balm Holder to your phone, insert Lanolips tube from the bottom of the Silicone Lip Balm Holder. Place onto the phone. You're ready to go!To remove, simply slide the Silicone Lip Balm Holder off sideways.1x Silicone 3M Ring - For Phones Which Are ++Not++ Magsafe:The Silicone 3M Ring is not required for Magsafe phones/cases.Silicone 3M ring is a magnet that sticks on your phone case to connect your Silicone (MagSafe) Lip Balm Holder. It is compatible with any case for iPhone 11 & earlier models; Android/other phones; cases without magnetic ring.Using the Silicone 3M Ring with 3M tape, remove the 3M sticker back, and apply to the back of the phone case.Continue with Steps 3 and 4 above.To remove the Silicone 3M Ring, use a citrus based solvent for adhesive removal. It is not Class 3 Flammable, which ensures it is much safer than traditional hydrocarbon solvents and can be easily wiped off with a clean cloth.Do not use the Silicone (MagSafe) Lip Balm Holder to pick up your phone. Do not put your fingers through it to hold your phone. Only intended to hold lip balm. Do not stick the 3M onto your phone directly, only onto a phone case.

reviews.headline: A must
reviews.comments: Love this balm make lips so soft

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the scent, it smells amazing! It leaves your lips feeling super hydrated. I love that it comes with the phone holder so you can take it with you everywhere and apply it at anytime. Super cute!

reviews.headline: Most perfect duo
reviews.comments: This scent is soooo good! It's my fav flavor and smells so pretty! Also love this lip for being so hydrating and moisturizing! This is a cool duo bc it comes with the phone holder so you can bring it anywhere

reviews.headline: Lanolips Is Amazing
reviews.comments: Ive always trusted this brand and i absolutely love the flavors of thier lippies i use then everywhere i go this one is my favorite

reviews.headline: Love this duo!
reviews.comments: Love this!! Must buy it!!!!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments:
Smells and feels amazing, super hydrating 
I'm obsessed

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: This product is honestly so helpful and pretty. I truly think it's very innovative and nice to have!

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: Leaves my lips so soft smells amazing and never leaves a cast of a film on my lips leaves them so shiny and moisturize and plump. I recommend this to everyone.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Smells amazing!

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Love this lip balm. Very hydrating!

reviews.headline: so stinking cute.
reviews.comments: i absolutely fell in love with this product. it looks adorable on my phone— it fits all sizes and shapes of lippies and that is awesome! 10000% recommend. lanolips balms are amazing so this just made me want all of their products lol

reviews.headline: smells so good!
reviews.comments: My friend recommended this to me, and I would give it 10/10 to someone as a birthday gift! And I love the phone lip balm holder.

reviews.headline: Best Lippie
reviews.comments: highly recommend

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: This balm is so good. It feels sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo good and it's so cheap. I love the brand because its so cheap and good

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments:
This lip balm is everything. The strawberry scent? Sweet but not fake. The texture? Glossy, hydrating, and lasts forever. My lips feel baby-soft, and I'm not even exaggerating.
AND it comes with the cutest little phone holder for the balm — I'm obsessed. It's giving "never losing my lip balm again" vibes.
Perfect for throwing in your bag, clipping to your phone, or just flexing how cute your lip care is. I LOVE it!

reviews.headline: Healed the crack in my lip
reviews.comments: I had a crack in my lip for over a year. I used this at night in combination with a lip scrub and lip balm and within a week the crack was gone.

reviews.headline: Super functional!
reviews.comments: I love this product! The lip balm itself is super hydrating and lasts longer than other brands I've tried. The holder is super innovative and I can honestly put any product in it aside from the one it comes with. The pink is super cute too which helps!!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I already love Lanolips, so this is a great idea. You can also use it with anything, so its perfect for a night out and not having to worry about losing a good lip product.

reviews.headline: Life saver !
reviews.comments: I work at a seasonal ice rink and sometimes we have to stand outside for hours. This comes in handy because my lips stay hydrated for a while! I love to top it with the NYX duck plump:)

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: The balm itself is amazing! I put this on all the time since its attached to my phone. I wake up with very moisturized lips, even my SO has noticed.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This lip balm is everything. The strawberry scent? Sweet but not fake. The texture? Glossy, hydrating, and lasts forever. My lips feel baby-soft, and I'm not even exaggerating.
AND it comes with the cutest little phone holder for the balm — I'm obsessed. It's giving "never losing my lip balm again" vibes.
Perfect for throwing in your bag, clipping to your phone, or just flexing how cute your lip care is. I LOVE it!
faceoff_positive.headline: I would buy this product again and again!

faceoff_negative.comments: This product contains the ingredient Lanolin which has high instances of allergic reaction. My lips were swollen and uncomfortable after using. I also have eczema which apparently increases likelihood of sensitivity to it. If you dont react well to carmex(also has lanolin) this lip balm is not for you. I gave it 2 stars cause i like the mag safe phone holder. It secures lip balm well, can be used with many diff balms and the magnet is strong. Its better than other lip phone holders ive tried.
faceoff_negative.headline: Allergy Warning

rollup.name: 101 Ointment Strawberry & Phone Lip Balm Holder
